mapper.select: select ep.id as experienceProgramId, ep.experience_program_title, ep.experience_program_job, ep.experience_program_deadline, ep.experience_program_view_count, ep.corp_id, c.corp_company_name from tbl_experience_program ep join tbl_corp c on ep.corp_id = c.id where ep.experience_program_status = 'recruiting' order by ep.experience_program_view_count desc limit #{limit}

select ep.id as experienceProgramId, ep.experience_program_title, ep.experience_program_job, ep.experience_program_deadline, ep.experience_program_view_count, ep.corp_id, c.corp_company_name from tbl_experience_program ep join tbl_corp c on ep.corp_id = c.id where ep.experience_program_status = 'recruiting' and c.corp_company_type = '공기업' order by ep.experience_program_view_count desc limit #{limit}
